sen.j: 中村 芝鶴（なかむら しかく）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Shikaku NAKAMURA (中村 芝鶴) is one of the myoseki (family names) of kabuki actors.
Shikaku NAKAMURA is one of the myoseki (family names) of kabuki actors.
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: Shikaku NAKAMURA is one of the myoseki (family names) of kabuki actors.

sen.j: - 幾ばくも活躍なく1843年に没。
sen.e: - He was not so remarkably active and died in 1843.
He was not so remarkably active and died in 1843.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました
sen.e: He was not so remarkably active and died in 1843.
The year of his death is unknown.
The year of his death is unknown.
The year of his death is unknown.

sen.j: 中村七三郎 (4代目)の門下から中村歌右衛門 (4代目)（二代目中村芝翫時代）の門人。
sen.e: At first he was a disciple of Shichisaburo NAKAMURA the fourth, but later converted to a disciple of Utaemon NAKAMURA the fourth (in the days of Shikan NAKAMURA the second).
At first he was a disciple of Shichisaburo NAKAMURA the fourth, but later converted to a disciple of Utaemon NAKAMURA the fourth (in the days of Shikan NAKAMURA the second).
At first he was a disciple of Shichisaburo NAKAMURA the fourth, but later converted to a disciple of Utaemon NAKAMURA the fourth (in the days of Shikan NAKAMURA the second).

sen.j: 屋号は吾妻屋、高砂屋、鶴屋。
sen.e: His yago (stage family name) was, Azumaya (吾妻屋), Takasagoya (高砂屋) and Tsuruya (鶴屋).
His yago (stage family name) was, Azumaya, Takasagoya and Tsuruya.
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: His yago (stage family name) was, Azumaya, Takasagoya and Tsuruya.

His Haimyo (also known as Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Enshi (園枝).
sen.cmt: 「園枝」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: His Haimyo (also known as Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Sonoe.
sen.cmt: 園枝→Sonoe に訂正しました。漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: His Haimyo (also known as Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Sonoe.

sen.j: 中村七次 → 四代目吾妻藤蔵 → 中村芝鶴
sen.e: Shichiji NAKAMURA (中村七次) => Tozo AZUMA the fourth (四代目吾妻藤蔵) => Shikaku NAKAMURA (中村芝鶴).
sen.cmt: 「中村七次」、「吾妻藤蔵」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: Shichiji NAKAMURA - Tozo AZUMA the fourth - Shikaku NAKAMURA
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。矢印の記号をハイフンにしました。
sen.e: Shichiji NAKAMURA - Tozo AZUMA the fourth - Shikaku NAKAMURA
- Later renamed Denkuro NAKAMURA (中村傳九郎) the sixth.
Later renamed Denkuro NAKAMURA the sixth.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: Later renamed Denkuro NAKAMURA the sixth.
- An adopted child of the Shikaku the first.
An adopted child of the Shikaku the first.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: An adopted child of the Shikaku the first.

sen.j: 中村由丸 → 三代目中村歌之助 → 二代目中村芝鶴
sen.e: Yoshimaru NAKAMURA (中村由丸) => Utanosuke NAKAMURA the third (三代目中村歌之助) => Shikaku NAKAMURA the second (二代目中村芝鶴)
sen.cmt: 「中村由丸」、「中村歌之助」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: Yoshimaru NAKAMURA - Utanosuke NAKAMURA the third - Shikaku NAKAMURA the second
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。矢印の記号をハイフンにしました。
sen.e: Yoshimaru NAKAMURA - Utanosuke NAKAMURA the third - Shikaku NAKAMURA the second
